post_title: FS: T206 Cobb Bat on Shoulder SGC 3
post_content:
Card is SOLD.

Very nice SGC 3.  Card has great centering and eye appeal. Card looks like an SGC 4 or 5.  Card does have slight paper loss on the back lower left corner.

$5750 Net or add 3% for GS

PM if you have interest.
